statements: DELETE FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE user_id = 500 AND transaction_type = 'buy';
DELETE FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE user_id = 101 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'buy';
DELETE FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND receiver_address = '0x123456789abcdef';
DELETE FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 100 AND currency = 'USD';
